sn35.95:4.1: Atha kho āyasmā mālukyaputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami … pe …
sn35.95:4.2: ekamantaṃ nisinno kho āyasmā mālukyaputto bhagavantaṃ etadavoca:
sn35.95:4.3: “sādhu me, bhante, bhagavā saṃkhittena dhammaṃ desetu, yamahaṃ bhagavato dhammaṃ sutvā eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto vihareyyan”ti.
sn35.95:5.1: “Ettha dāni, mālukyaputta, kiṃ dahare bhikkhū vakkhāma.
sn35.95:5.2: Yatra hi nāma tvaṃ, bhikkhu, jiṇṇo vuddho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto saṅkhittena ovādaṃ yācasī”ti.
sn35.95:6.1: “Kiñcāpāhaṃ, bhante, jiṇṇo vuddho mahallako addhagato vayoanuppatto.
sn35.95:6.2: Desetu me, bhante, bhagavā saṅkhittena dhammaṃ, desetu sugato saṅkhittena dhammaṃ, appeva nāmāhaṃ bhagavato bhāsitassa atthaṃ ājāneyyaṃ.
sn35.95:6.3: Appeva nāmāhaṃ bhagavato bhāsitassa dāyādo assan”ti.
sn35.95:7.1: “Taṃ kiṃ maññasi, mālukyaputta, ye te cakkhuviññeyyā rūpā adiṭṭhā adiṭṭhapubbā, na ca passasi, na ca te hoti passeyyanti?
sn35.95:7.2: Atthi te tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṃ vā”ti?
sn35.95:8.1: “Ye te sotaviññeyyā saddā assutā assutapubbā, na ca suṇāsi, na ca te hoti suṇeyyanti?
sn35.95:8.2: Atthi te tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṃ vā”ti?
sn35.95:9.1: “Ye te ghānaviññeyyā gandhā aghāyitā aghāyitapubbā, na ca ghāyasi, na ca te hoti ghāyeyyanti?
sn35.95:9.2: Atthi te tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṃ vā”ti?
sn35.95:10.1: “Ye te jivhāviññeyyā rasā asāyitā asāyitapubbā, na ca sāyasi, na ca te hoti sāyeyyanti?
sn35.95:10.2: Atthi te tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṃ vā”ti?
sn35.95:11.1: “Ye te kāyaviññeyyā phoṭṭhabbā asamphuṭṭhā asamphuṭṭhapubbā, na ca phusasi, na ca te hoti phuseyyanti?
sn35.95:11.2: Atthi te tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṃ vā”ti?
sn35.95:12.1: “Ye te manoviññeyyā dhammā aviññātā aviññātapubbā, na ca vijānāsi, na ca te hoti vijāneyyanti?
sn35.95:12.2: Atthi te tattha chando vā rāgo vā pemaṃ vā”ti?
sn35.95:13.1: “Ettha ca te, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbesu dhammesu diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissati, sute sutamattaṃ bhavissati, mute mutamattaṃ bhavissati, viññāte viññātamattaṃ bhavissati.
sn35.95:13.2: Yato kho te, mālukyaputta, diṭṭhasutamutaviññātabbesu dhammesu diṭṭhe diṭṭhamattaṃ bhavissati, sute sutamattaṃ bhavissati, mute mutamattaṃ bhavissati, viññāte viññātamattaṃ bhavissati;
sn35.95:13.7: tato tvaṃ, mālukyaputta, nevidha, na huraṃ, na ubhayamantarena.
sn35.95:14.1: “Imassa khvāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmi:
sn35.95:15.4: Tañca ajjhosa tiṭṭhati.
sn35.95:39.1: Imassa khvāhaṃ, bhante, bhagavatā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāmī”ti.
sn35.95:39.3: Sādhu kho tvaṃ, mālukyaputta, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṃ ājānāsi:
sn35.95:45.1: Imassa kho, mālukyaputta, mayā saṅkhittena bhāsitassa evaṃ vitthārena attho daṭṭhabbo”ti.
sn35.95:46.1: Atha kho āyasmā mālukyaputto bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinanditvā anumoditvā uṭṭhāyāsanā bhagavantaṃ abhivādetvā padakkhiṇaṃ katvā pakkāmi.
sn35.95:46.2: Atha kho āyasmā mālukyaputto eko vūpakaṭṭho appamatto ātāpī pahitatto viharanto nacirasseva—
sn35.95:46.3: yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṃ pabbajanti, tadanuttaraṃ—
sn35.95:46.4: brahmacariyapariyosānaṃ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṃ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja vihāsi.
sn35.95:46.5: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṃ brahmacariyaṃ, kataṃ karaṇīyaṃ, nāparaṃ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
sn35.95:46.6: Aññataro ca panāyasmā mālukyaputto arahataṃ ahosīti.
